descriptionHtml:
Latest notes click the version number above ^^

[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft 3.0+[/url] by ArcaneSmith
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=/downloads/file.php?id=12693]Einherjar Armor[/url] by Omesean
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=/downloads/file.php?id=3201]Fur Hoods HD[/url] by Northborn

--
Module for Lorecraft - requires [url=/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft-3.0[/url]+ download to function.

--
[b]Features[/b]
Books for each of the armour types - light and heavy - 2 in total.
Lorecraft dynamic looting and vendors.

--
[b]Load Order[/b]
Ensure this loads after EinherjarArmor.esp
You do not need the FurHoods esp file so you don\'t need to enable it.
author: ScarabMonkey and Omesean

files.name: Lorecraft_EinherjarArmor_1-0
files.changelogHtml:
Initial Release
Includes lorecraft dynamic looting and vendors
